name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Nick Wagter)
description:
Dungeon Escape,

Dungeon Crawler game where the player has to traverse the dungeon to get to the exit and leave the dungeon to win the game, while finding solutions for obstacles encountered.

How to play:

Your objective is to find the ladder in the dungeon to find your way out of the dungeon.

This game contains 3 small levels to play.

Keyboard and Mouse

Controller
